reviews.review: Игра ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥, чисто для маньяков. Выжить не возможно, постоянно порчи всякие, есть порчи на порчи, есть аим, вулхак, залупа потерянного коня, вырубить с одно раза, при этом эти ебаные порчи появляются в самой разной ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥оляндии, дисболанс конкретный, разрабы полные пидары не способные на дальнейшее развитее! Добавят нового мана, и ни♥♥♥♥♥♥ его не сбалансируют, специально делают его таким ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ам, чтоб его люди покупали и могли накапливать кровь им просто на изи, даже без каких либо перков. Недавно добавили фреди крюгера, телепортация, ловишки с саными палетками, может быть в энвизе, ни♥♥♥♥♥♥ не видно, даже не отправив в сон, ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥анёт просто так, и ему ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ на всё. 2016 çıkışlı bir oyun , bakıyorsunuz grafikler ve içerikler gayet hoş. Çok iyi olmasa da bir denge oturtulmuş oyunda. Satışları da kendi türü içinde en yüksek seviyelerde ama gel gelelim şu oyunun lobi kısmı çözülemedi hala. Bu kadar mı kötü olur bir oyunun lobileri? Bu kadar mı berbat olur server'ları. İnsanı çileden çıkarıyor. Oynamak istiyorsunuz ama oyun size "beni oynama" diyor. 
DLC çıkarmayı biliyorlar ama şu sorunları çözmeyi başaramıyorlar. Ara ara yüklüyorum acaba düzelmiş midir bir bakayım diye ama yok arkadaş. Lanet olsun aldığım güne.

Almayın aldırtmayın.
Рефанд

Do I like this game? Yes!
Would I recommend this game? No!

The game contains many features the sum of which amount to an average experience.
*Quick time events
*Lots of holding down buttons for long periods of time
*Huge/long grinds for unlocking items
*Plenty of paid only content
*RNG affecting gameplay
*Terrible matchmaking
*Buggy
*Toxic community

There are several occasions when the game will become a lot of fun, being chased by the killer is intense, chasing survivors is thrilling. Sneaking around while the killer is nearby will certainly put fear into your bones, killing all the survivors (or even most of them) is estatic.

At best, I would suggest this game is better than average at  6/10, while positive there are simply so many other games with more fun to be had for your time.

Get the game!

Two hours into this game, I absolutely loathed it. Playing against killers felt like an impending cycle of doom and despair, and it felt frustrating fruitlessly trying to outrun a killer with any idea of how to play the game. Now I'm 200+ hours in, and I've never experienced this kind of "I am glad I was wrong" phenomenon with any other game. 

Not only is there a solid amount of depth between all the different perks and items, but the gameplay itself has got me discovering more and more ways of being that much more effective as both a survivor and a killer every time I play it. As a Survivor, the ways in which you can outsmart the Killer are numerous (and outright ridiculous), and the feeling of satisfaction when you and your friends make it out alive is remarkable. The early hours as a survivor are tough, and there isn't a great way of finding out what to do and not to do as a beginner, which may deter newer players, but I personally find the learning process rewarding. It's not always about making it out alive, but getting that much better for when you take on the next trial. But the game isn't called "Survive by Daylight", and it's when you quit running and get to slashing that things really take an interesting turn.

I think I can pinpoint the moment I began turning around on this game when I first played as a Killer. The feeling of brutally shutting down the survivors' efforts and outsmarting them is immensely satisfying, and the roster of Killers leads to distinct learning curves that makes me interested in mastering every single one of them. Not only that, but playing as each of the Killers allowed me to better understand how to beat them when me and my friends try to survive against them. I came to this game trying to survive, but I think it's playing Killer that will keep me to stay.

Positives aside, I would have to say my biggest complaint with this game is the balance issues, particularly how the game leans towards Survivors (which is impossible to believe if you only play Survivor). I'm aware that the developers are constantly working to make the game as balanced as possible, but the combination of numerous bugs and connection issues can add up to some pretty frustrating matches. I'd also appreciate if there was a better means of avoiding certain players so as not to repeat some very toxic player experiences I've had so far. 

I could talk on and on about this game (and I just might some time), but I will definitely say that this is a worthwhile $20 well spent, and I'm really happy to see that the developers are steadily adding more and more content to make this a long-living community.

Be kind to one another, and for the love of all that is holy please stop tea-bagging after you slam a pallet down. It's very unbecoming. Best of luck in the Fog, my friends.

I personally have enjoyed playing this game quite a bit, but I would NOT recommend it to new players. I bought this game roughly 2 months ago, and I've learned quite a bit about playing it, and the main thing I've realized is that the game itself and the community that play it are not welcoming to new players at all. 

The game itself makes it very hard to play at a high level unless you grind for probably about 100 hours, potentially more if you want to play both survivor and killer. The reason it takes so long, is that you have to grind characters to level them up in order to unlock abilities for all the characters. Now, you CAN still play both survivor and killer without meta perks, but once you start to get to higher ranks, it gets much more difficult to win games without them, especially as killer. I'm at about 85 hours currently and have finally unlocked I think 4 of the meta abilities for killer alone. One might take less time to unlock meta perks, but when I first started playing, I didn't know how necessary it was to grind certain characters, so I was just leveling up everybody. 
(I want to note that the devs have said that they're trying to make their game more approachable for newer players, so hopefully this will change soon.)
EDIT: They made it so it's SLIGHTLY easier to grind for perks, but only marginally, so I'm going to keep this part in my review. I've doubled my hours since posting this review and I'm still grinding for certain meta perks.

The community in this game is super toxic, definitely one of the most toxic communities I've seen. Not everybody is an asshole, but a very large percentage are. If a killer doesn't like you, or how you play, they'll only go after you, or camp your body when you're hooked so you'll die. Survivors tend to be toxic regardless of who you play or how you play. They'll Tbag constantly, or point at you any time they stun you. Also, if you don't play how the others WANT you to play, they'll flame you in the chat after the game's over. I remember one of my first games, my teammates were flaming me in chat after the game because I unhooked him too soon, so he ended up going down twice in a row. I was like rank 17, still didn't know how the game works. I've been flamed by both killers and survivors a ton in this game, but it tends to mostly be survivors that do it. I've just turned off chat in this game now.
EDIT: The game has somehow gotten even more toxic lately. Tons of survivors are now disconnecting from games and I'm not sure why it started, but it has started ruining about half the matches I play. Until the devs do something about DCing, then this game is going to keep spiraling into the shitter.

Also, survive with friends is a very unbalanced thing in this game. One of the ways the game is balanced is the fact that all the survivors lack communication, so they have to be weary of who the killer is, where he is, what he's doing, etc... using small clues that the game gives you, so that they know when it's safe or not to do certain tasks. When 4 people queue together as survivor, that throws all that in the toilet because they can use 3rd party voice chat to tell each other where the killer is, what he's doing, which pallets are used and not used, etc... This is essentially "easy mode" for survivors, but I don't think they devs are going to do anything about it, because if they removed it or limited it, a big chunk of their player base will disappear because a majority of the players for this game are survivor players. It also doesn't help that survive with friend players tend to be the most toxic of all.

Killer also has very overpowered things, like Mori's and the omegablink nurse (base nurse is fine) but I think the big difference between them and survive with friends(SWF) is that Mori's aren't actually all that fun to use, but SWF is very fun to do because you're playing the game with your friends, and that's obviously going to be more fun to do.

Also, as a bonus note, the developers like to turn a blind eye to stream sniping in this game. I've seen quite a few streamers get (very blatantly) sniped in this game, and they devs have stated that they're just okay with it, and they're not going to ban them, even when it persists for days, weeks, or months.

BUT if you have thick skin, can put in the time to grind for perks, but are okay with the game being unbalanced in some ways, then this game is a lot of fun. It's just a lot to get over before the game becomes enjoyable.

TLDR: 
A LOT of grinding in this game (may be changed in the future)
one of the most toxic communities I've encountered
search with friends is overpowered (probably won't change in the future)
devs are okay with stream sniping

game and community not welcoming to new players, but if you can get over all the humps, it's fun for the most part.

I recommend this game, but you have to understand what the game actually is before going into it. Its an unfair pay to win strategy game, and some people are okay with that.

Honestly, despite this game having a lot of unusual hit box and network issues the mechanics and player base make this a very repeatable game that you can have fun with for a long time.

Pros
-Best Graphics 2020
-Best Hit Box Mechanics
-I only disconnect from matches 3 times per hour
-Smartest teammates
-Red ranks have time to do their taxes while in queue
-Thicc

Cons
-Death is not an escape
-You'll probably have an anxiety attack if you hate loud music
-You'll always survive if you're the killer
-Use the restroom while in queue
-The game is free to play if you buy it

This game never appealed to me upon glance but I wanted to test it for myself so I bought it on sale & I am extremely glad I did. I absolutely love this game and probably will rack up hundreds of hours to come over the weeks and months. I'm massively hooked on this game. 

Play as survivors, work as a team of 4 and activate 5 generators whilst trying to hide and outrun a killer who is out to stop you. Once all generators are activated you work on getting the escape and try get out alive together for the maximum rewards.

Killers are extremely enjoyable to play as & have a variety of different characters you can choose from or buy with DLC content. A LOT of fun, especially as a noob learner, almost guaranteed to have an excellent time slicing people & popping them onto hooks. It's great! 

There is perks/skill points/excess items you can add onto your characters by leveling up & improving as you go which can add to the enjoyment of the grinding aspect to the game & help your survivor or killers improve. 

Massively recommend this game & especially if you get some friends to play with, really enjoyable. Lots of fun!

Dead by Daylight was originally meant to be a horror game, where the Survivors will have to escape a Realm, before the Killer gets a chance to Kill them.
But, due to the other non-understandable stuff, there's a creature, called the Entity, that has unknown gender, unknown voice, unknown... Nothing is clear about it. And, this creature, the Entity has affected normal, classic people, who've been through a lot more than anyone can even imagine.
Some of them have died, or have almost died, and the Entity was the only chance to live. Some didn't die, but the Entity has taken them and used them.
None of those have tried or learnt, how to escape the Entity itself, so, they work with it. They bring her Survivors, people, to Sacrifice them for it. That way, the Killers have to Hook those Survivors, instead of Killing them.
[spoiler]Do not expect, that this game is based on reality. It's not.[/spoiler]

So, the Survivors have to repair the five Generators to give the Gates enough of a power to be opened. Once they open them, they can escape, but in the meantime, the Killer is hunting them. The Survivors can run, use windows, wooden Pallets, that can be dropped, (...), to escape the Killer.
Once they reach the area in one of the two Exit Gates, they've escaped the Realm, and have survived that day.

This should be enough for the basic informations about this game, but gameplay differs from them a bit, so, take it in mind.

The Developers are well aware, that the Survivors, those players, can use unarthorized third party programs, that gain an unfair advantage over the Killer - over the players without even being punished.
This game wasn't meant and isn't meant for voice communications, but because something went wrong, they've allowed them to use it.
They can't afford to make them as a bannable offense, as they may lose around 60 % or more of their whole playerbase, if they do so.
In short, even here is being applied a term, ''money > fun, fair-play.

And, the most annoying part.
The Developers haven't learnt a thing. Instead, they've decided to give the majority of their, this, playerbase (to the Survivors) an option to leave, to disconnect from the match without any further punishment, except of not gaining any Bloodpoints from the match, that are being spend on upgrading your characters.
They can even keep their Items, that can cost from 3 000 Bloodpoints to 19 000 Bloodpoints. That has been acknowledged numerous times, no response, no action has been taken.
Yes, they've told us, that they do ban people for leaving very often, like 2/5 off of their total number of matches played, so, almost never.

And, a part of it, that can basically rid out your feeling about winning the match, if you play as a Killer, that there's a Hatch, AKA black door., that spawns randomly in the map, whenever there's only one Survivor remaining.
So, the Survivors can easily just disconnect, and the last Survivor can escape without any effort, just because that player has decided to do so.
It's been acknowledged, and nothing has been done about it.

And, a bit of a grimm part, why this game isn't suitable for people, who can't take being insulted, harrassed, threatened, getting wishes to die, their family to die, (...).
The community is mostly very annoying, thanks to the way they tend to behave. I don't mean to throw everyone into one single bag, but if you beat them in the match, they're able to spam on your profile page, into your comment wall, that you're, ..... I'll rather not elaborate it any further, as I'd have had to break the Steam rules in order to do that.

There is no Valve-Anti-Cheat ban, so, that's why none can be banned for using third party programs.
The game isn't that well optimized, so, you do need a bit better PC than the current average is nowadays, and that's it.


Think twice before buying the license to be able to play this game.
It can really change yourself into a very annoying person, who can't take any criticism, who has to be angry, who can't control himself / herself, and so on.

If you're interested in what I've meant about the harrassments and insults, feel free to take a look at my profile page, at the comment wall of mine.
You'll see, what do I mean, and quickly understand, why I am so much against this game.
Yes, I do enjoy it to some degree, but every sinlge insult, no matter against whom it has been used kinda makes me feel, like I don't belong to this community.
The majority doesn't respect the PEGI recommended age, so, expect the same community as from Rocket League - A community, where you'll highly probably meet a five year old people, therefore kids, who can't control themselves.
The thing is, they don't care, that they're not even aware of how stupid they do look.

I can't recommend this game, right now, as the harrassments and insults are normal, because the Developers can't afford to ban the majority of their whole community, the community of this game.

If you decide to join us, I do really wish you a lot of luck, but even more of health. Those people don't think before they act, they can change your whole yourself, if you play this game very often. Be careful out there.

See you in The Fog!

***
Yes.. And, don't even bother with the support. They'll gladly ignore you - Both, BHVR and Valve.
One of the best Horror chasing games 10/10 (You will Enjoy It)

Игра очень интересная, спасибо разработчикам, что интересно играть как за маньяка, так и за выживших, что очень важно. Очень классный геймплэй и графон, интересно играть. Перки - интересны тем, что их нужно изучать и научиться применять. 10\10

So this game is... At some points fun and some points frustrating like hell! Most new players quit the game because of how there 1st match went. This game IS NOT a horror game. It's more a survival type of game we're the survivors try to fight back at the killer. You as a new player probably want to play killer because you will be strong like god and all. But you are better of watching a guide so you will know what the expect. You need a strong will and the ability to think positive instead of negative. You need the ability to say "Fuck off!" to anger or sadness. Keep learning. Watch a few guides for the basics. If you are strong in thinking positive than I reccomend you the game if you are interested in a little challenge. If you are bad at this. Maybe not buy it..
This is the dumbest and stupidest game I ever played.You just run and nothing else.You cant fight back , you cant do a shit.I dont recommend this coz I dont see the point in this game.

Наверное это лучшая игра в данном стиле, Но без нюансов не обошлось...

Пометка для разработчиков: Нет возможности прокачивать паутину за кровь в автоматическом режиме (щелкая одну кнопку, а не выбирая раз за разом путь, делая 100500 кликов). 

Плюсы:
1. Тематика прятки.
2. Оптимизация хороша, 60 кадров стабильно на максимальных настройках.

Минусы:
1. Карт не мало, но без игровых подношений, бросает на одни и те же.
2. Престиж персонажа - было бы не плохо реализовать как отдельный эффект, для всех имеющих вещей, а так сомнительная штука.
3. Нюрса, конченный маньяк, его делал разраб явно с мелким членом!!! просто ломает всю  игровую механику, расстояние между игроками сокращается так быстро, что это ....ц, тупо нечем контрить, в умелых руках, можно просто ливать за сурва или стоять афк, не выигрывается в большинстве случаев. Пока маньяк в игре, это дизлайк.
